description: False usepbsrates forces BidRequest use custom currency rates but bidRequest currency is not found in bidRequest.ext.prebid.currency.rates field
BidRequest defines its own custom rates in the root.ext and sets the usepbsrates to false, not allowing for PBS to use its default converter and defaulting to a price of 0
expectedErrorMessage: Critical error while running the auction: Can't produce bid with no valid currency to use or currency conversion to convert to.
